data.subject: ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt
data.question: What is ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?
data.answer: ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt is a custom node that helps you understand what you're prompting for each property as you build your prompts.

data.subject: ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt
data.question: How many properties does ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt currently support?

data.subject: ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt
data.question: Is there a mandatory property in ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?
data.answer: Yes, Base is the mandatory property in ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt.

data.subject: ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt
data.question: Can ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt be used with other nodes?
data.answer: Yes, ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt can be used with [CLIP Text Encode (Prompt)](https://blenderneko.github.io/ComfyUI-docs/Core%20Nodes/Conditioning/CLIPTextEncode/) and the Show Text item in [ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts](https://github.com/pythongosssss/ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts).

data.subject: ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt
data.question: What should be checked to connect ScenarioPrompt to a prompt?
data.answer: To connect ScenarioPrompt to a prompt, you must check the **Convert text to input** box for CLIP Text Encode (Prompt).

data.subject: ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt
data.question: How is ScenarioPrompt's autocomplete feature inspired?
data.answer: ScenarioPrompt's autocomplete feature is inspired by the source codes from [ComfyUI - CustomNode Unlimited Prompt](https://github.com/PluMaZero/ComfyUI-SpaceFlower) and [NovelAI.app](https://github.com/gangjun06/NovelAI.app).

data.subject: ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt
data.question: Where can I find the tags used for autocomplete in ScenarioPrompt?
data.answer: The tags used for autocomplete in ScenarioPrompt are based on NovelAI.app's googlesheet.

data.subject: ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt
data.question: How can I install ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?
data.answer: To install ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt, navigate to your ComfyUI custom_nodes directory and clone the repository using `git clone https://github.com/Ludobico/ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt.git`.

data.subject: ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt
data.question: What are the references for ScenarioPrompt?
data.answer: The references for ScenarioPrompt are [NovelAI.app](https://github.com/gangjun06/NovelAI.app) and [ComfyUI-SpaceFlower](https://github.com/PluMaZero/ComfyUI-SpaceFlower).
